title: IP amount bug
body:
I just purchased mao'kai and the IP indicator on my client says -3841. I had just over 5000 IP when I purchased him and he was a 4800 IP champion. I should have close to 1000 IP left. Just thought I would post to keep you all aware. Happy farming!

~T

replies.body:
Hiya Jester T! 

This is a visual bug with the client. D: Logging out and logging in should resolve this!
It has been resolved...I just wanted somebody to know it was happening...I dont see bugs very often but try to report them if I do.
